DOC.brief_summary: This modify extension study SUmiT protocol UPC082008 ( NCT00534521 ) observe evaluate long term therapy PTNS overactive bladder symptom . Subjects must complete 12 weekly treatment original protocol , 13 week follow assessment , randomize PTNS arm , consider positive responder moderate mark improvement SUmiT Trial enrol study . All consent responder continue active PTNS therapy initially prescribe protocol approximately 3 month follow individualized symptom-based frequency visit determine subject along treat clinician , total 33 month post initial 12-week therapy total 3 year .
DOC.brief_title: Modified Extension Study SUmiT Trial : Evaluation Long Term Therapy With Percutaneous Tibial Nerve Stimulation ( PTNS ) Overactive Bladder Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Subjects sign informed consent eligible participate original SUmiT Trial Subjects randomize treat active PTNS therapy participation original SUmiT Trial Subject must positive responder initial 12 weekly treatment prescribe original SUmiT Trial 13 week GRA questionnaire must indicate `` moderately '' `` markedly improve '' question # 1 GRA Subjects must start antimuscarinics treatment since completion original SUmiT Trial Subjects must start urologic Botox treatment since completion original SUmiT Trial Subjects must remain antimuscarinics throughout participation trial Subjects must initiate PTNS maintenance therapy within 2 week last PTNS treatment part SUmiT protocol UPC082008 Capable give informed consent Capable willing follow studyrelated procedure 33 month total participation 3 year Pregnant confirm urine pregnancy test , plan become pregnant study period Subjects able willing follow original SUmiT Trial study schedule
